user_question: How can I effectively market a new line of eco-friendly, glow-in-the-dark garden gnomes?
final_answer: To effectively market your eco-friendly, glow-in-the-dark garden gnomes, consider targeting environmentally conscious consumers through social media platforms like Instagram and Pinterest. Highlight the unique glow-in-the-dark feature with captivating visuals and videos. Collaborate with eco-friendly influencers for authentic endorsements. Utilize SEO strategies to enhance online visibility and consider participating in eco-friendly trade shows for direct engagement.
